t: American Safety Razor Company - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Gem and Ever-Ready merged with Star to become the American Safety Razor Corporation in 1919. It was chartered in Virginia, while razor and blade production remained in Brooklyn. By 1921, it had produced 1.8 million safety razors, 110 million razor blades, a million shaving brushes and two million cakes of soap. By 1942, it had introduced and popularized the phrase "five o'clock shadow". In 1953, it acquired the Pal, Treet and Personna brands ...
